name: Davka: Throne WIP
description:
Click on the blue text. Some blue text will reveal more to read, while others will direct you to other pages.

----

You are Quicksilver and you are pondering on what to eat, while bothered on your family dynamics.

---

Part of the same universe as X-18: Upgrades

I do not own X-men.

WIP/ Rough coding/not finished.  Some pages are really rough. Was unable to finish in time for the "My First Game Jam: Summer 19" due to life issues.

This is an AU set in Genosha. All canon characters are different from their comics/movie/cartoon counterparts.  This is a demo/rough draft made for the "My First Game Jam." I make no money off this.
